# The `SchedDFSResult` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Compute the values of each DAG node for various metrics during DFS. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Compute the values of each DAG node for various metrics during DFS.

Definition at line 65 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/scheduledfs-h">ScheduleDFS.h</a>.

### compute() {#a788b324b6deb10dfbafa68a351b11c79}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void SchedDFSResult::compute (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &gt; SUnits)</>}>
Compute various metrics for the DAG with given roots.

Computes an ILP metric for all nodes in the subDAG reachable via depth-first search from this root.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/scheduledfs-h/#l00141">141</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/scheduledfs-h">ScheduleDFS.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/scheduledaginstrs-cpp/#l01466">1466</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/scheduledaginstrs-cpp">ScheduleDAGInstrs.cpp</a>.

### empty() {#a6f68ec6a70379c6574c1923f2aa362e3}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::SchedDFSResult::empty () const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return true if this DFSResult is uninitialized.

<a href="#ac89bf3172a045a4c074f93f83fe4b278">resize()</a> initializes DFSResult, while <a href="#a788b324b6deb10dfbafa68a351b11c79">compute()</a> populates it.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/scheduledfs-h/#l00125">125</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/scheduledfs-h">ScheduleDFS.h</a>.

### getSubtreeID() {#a2b2b597b59be28845565af32824bc8ed}

Get the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> of the subtree the given DAG node belongs to.

For convenience, if DFSResults have not been computed yet, give everything tree <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> 0.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/scheduledfs-h/#l00169">169</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/scheduledfs-h">ScheduleDFS.h</a>.

### getSubtreeLevel() {#aaf84316d1d82a870d06b3eea442d7571}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned llvm::SchedDFSResult::getSubtreeLevel (unsigned SubtreeID) const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Get the connection level of a subtree.

For bottom-up trees, the connection level is the latency depth (in cycles) of the deepest connection to another subtree.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/scheduledfs-h/#l00180">180</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/scheduledfs-h">ScheduleDFS.h</a>.

### scheduleTree() {#ad1896b1b6c5eecd41078e6383fd6f207}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void SchedDFSResult::scheduleTree (unsigned SubtreeID)">
Scheduler callback to update SubtreeConnectLevels when a tree is initially scheduled.

The root of the given SubtreeID was just scheduled.

For all subtrees connected to this tree, record the depth of the connection so that the nearest connected subtrees can be prioritized.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/scheduledfs-h/#l00186">186</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/scheduledfs-h">ScheduleDFS.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/scheduledaginstrs-cpp/#l01512">1512</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/scheduledaginstrs-cpp">ScheduleDAGInstrs.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

This mutable array is updated during scheduling.
